consentModal.label: Cookie Consent
consentModal.title: Hello traveller, it's cookie time!
consentModal.description: Our website uses essential cookies to ensure its proper operation and tracking cookies to understand how you interact with it. The latter will be set only after consent.

sections.title: Somebody said ... cookies?
sections.description: We use cookies to improve your experience, provide personalized content, and analyze our traffic. By continuing to browse, you agree to our use of cookies. Learn more about our cookie policy and how to manage your settings.

sections.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies Always Enabled
sections.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They are typically set only in response to actions you take, such as setting your privacy preferences, logging in, or filling out forms.

sections.title: Analytics Cookies
sections.description: Analytics cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously. This helps us improve the user experience.

sections.title: More Information
sections.description: If you have any questions about our cookie policy or your options, please contact us.
